<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H5396|נִשְׁמָא]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נשׁם‎</span>] **verb** ==pant== (Late Hebrew in nouns <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְשִׁימָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְשָׁמָה‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁמָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁמְתָא‎</span>; late Aramaic Ithpe\`el; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***breathe, blow***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***gently breathe*** (of wind), etc.; see ***seek a thing with labour and perseverance*** ([[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>3032</sup>); <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a soul***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>ib</sup>.); — ***pant***, of the deep and strong breathing of a woman in travail; **Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשֹּׁם‎</span> [[Isa.42.14|Isa 42:14]].
